SELECT MS_SI_SALARY_ID,
KIND, START_DATE, END_DATE, PREV_MS_SI_SALARY_ID,
USER_KEY, DATA_NO, DELETE_FLAG, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, RENEW_USER_ID, RENEW_DATE, TS
FROM MS_SI_SALARY
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 0

INSERT INTO MS_SI_SALARY( MS_SI_SALARY_ID ,
KIND , START_DATE , END_DATE , PREV_MS_SI_SALARY_ID ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( Nextval( 'SEQ_MS_SI_SALARY_ID' ),
:KIND, :START_DATE , :END_DATE , :PREV_MS_SI_SALARY_ID ,
:DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_SI_SALARY SET KIND = :KIND , START_DATE = :START_DATE , END_DATE = :END_DATE , PREV_MS_SI_SALARY_ID = :PREV_MS_SI_SALARY_ID ,
DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE MS_SI_SALARY_ID = :MS_SI_SALARY_ID AND TS = :TS
